Input.PartyLookup.description: Allows a user to select customer from list of customers

id.description: Unique identifier for the value. Used to identify collected input when the Submit action is performed.

value.description: The initial choice (or set of choices) that should be selected.

placeholder.description: Description of the input desired. Only visible when no selection has been made.

dataSource.description: Asee API DataSource for customer lookup
